name: Autumn of the World
description:
It's my first game in Unity3D made for #LOWREZJAM 2016. Try to find the way to escape a house, surrounded by zombie hordes. There are 3 slightly different endings (only 1 of them is relatively happy). If you'll find some typos or other mistakes in texts, please leave comments.

Controls:

Z - Examine
X - Use/Pick Up
Arrows to move
I - Look at Inventory (just to know )
